ProjectTitle: Proof of concept: immunotherapy in glioblastoma multiforme.

3. Ethics: you also mention mouse models in you data table, do you already have ethical approval for this work? Please also list these approval numbers. 
7. Sharing: Have you considered using repositories for sharing, maybe EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) or KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr). Here you can still restrict access to the data if needed but others can find your data easier and request access via the repository.
label: good with suggestions
